TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectPastingEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectPastingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectPastingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectPastingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectPastingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs ^ e);
type DataObjectPastingEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataObjectPastingEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的事件时已选择要粘贴的数据格式粘贴操作之前发生实际粘贴数据。The attached event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste, but before the data is actually pasted. 通常执行的操作附加的事件处理程序包括：Actions typically performed by a attached event handler include: - 通过设置新值更改所选的粘贴格式属性。Change the selected paste format by setting new value for the property. - 将自定义数据格式应用于粘贴所选内容。Apply a custom data format to the paste selection. - 创建一个新，并将其分配给属性的`e`。Create a new , and assign it to the property of `e`. 原始数据对象的只读副本存储在。A read-only copy of the original data object is stored in . - 通过调用取消粘贴操作。Cancel the paste operation by calling . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果粘贴格式已更改，是负责确保新选择的粘贴格式粘贴目标可以使用处理程序方法。If the paste format is changed, the handler method is responsible for ensuring that a newly selected paste format is consumable by the paste target.
